Rule.Name: Ensure PostgreSQL subdirectory locations are outside the data cluster
Rule.NonCompliantComment: PostgreSQL subdirectory locations are inside the data cluster, which may expose them to unauthorized access.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure PostgreSQL subdirectory locations (e.g., backups, logs, WAL archive) are outside the data cluster. Command: 1. Move the subdirectories to secure locations outside the data cluster. 2. Update the postgresql.conf file to reflect the new locations (e.g., log_directory, archive_command).

Rule.Name: Ensure pgBackRest is installed and configured correctly
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The backup and restore tool, 'pgBackRest', is not installed or not configured correctly, which may prevent reliable backups.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure pgBackRest is installed and configured properly with a secure configuration file and validated with a check command.

Rule.Name: Ensure miscellaneous configuration settings are correctly set
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Miscellaneous configuration settings are not configured correctly, which may affect security and performance.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Review and configure miscellaneous settings. Command: 1. Ensure appropriate settings for work_mem, maintenance_work_mem, autovacuum settings, etc. 2. Adjust these parameters based on the server's role and available resources.
